channel.title: gba on Iván Makes Games
channel.description: Recent content in gba on Iván Makes Games

item.title: Mazes of Fate (GBA)
item.description: Mazes of Fate Description: My first project in the videogame industry. An old school first person RPG for the Nintendo Gameboy Advance. I believe it was one of the first latin american games released on a Nintendo console. I started off as a QA tester and ended up doing plenty of production work and some light scripting. Technologies: C Lua
